p: This allo-priming mechanism can also be used as a counter-measure to bio-terrorism and bio-economic terrorism. Individuals that have been primed with alloantigen could be treated with an emergency injection of alloantigen to activate innate immunity and initiate the cascade of immune events leading to clearance of an unknown pathogen. Alloantigen could be provided in syringes for emergency ID injection upon concern for bioweapon exposure or first occurrence of symptoms, much in the same manner as epinephrine is provided to prevent anaphylactic shock.
